skill.name: audit-plan
skill.tagline: Verify every planned change was implemented correctly with evidence-based auditing
skill.shortSummary: Audits plan execution by comparing planned tasks against actual implementation state
skill.fullSummary: This skill automatically verifies that all tasks from a session plan were correctly implemented. It loads the plan file, checks each task against actual files and commands, and provides a structured audit report. You get confidence that your planned changes were executed as intended, with clear evidence of any discrepancies.

highlights.title: Evidence-Based Verification
highlights.description: Trusts evidence over assumptions by checking actual files and command outputs. This eliminates guesswork about whether changes were properly implemented, giving you concrete proof of execution status.

highlights.title: Structured Audit Report
highlights.description: Provides a clear summary table showing each task's status (Done/Partial/Missing) with supporting evidence. You get an at-a-glance view of what was implemented correctly and where issues exist.

highlights.title: Comprehensive Task Checking
highlights.description: Verifies file creation, content changes, deletions, and command outputs for every task in your plan. Nothing gets overlooked, ensuring complete coverage of your planned work.

highlights.title: Final Workflow Step
highlights.description: Designed as the concluding step in plan-based workflows. After implementation, this skill gives you the confidence that everything was done correctly before moving on.

steps.name: Load Plan File
steps.description: Reads the session plan file containing all planned tasks and file references.
steps.details: The skill accesses the plan file created during the planning session, extracting the complete task list and all associated file paths. This ensures it audits against the original plan specifications.

steps.name: Verify Each Task
steps.description: Checks every task against actual implementation state.
steps.details: For each planned task, the skill verifies file existence, content changes, deletions, and runs any verification commands. It compares what was planned against what actually exists in the codebase.

steps.name: Generate Audit Report
steps.description: Creates a structured summary showing implementation status.
steps.details: The skill presents a clear table showing each task's status (Done/Partial/Missing) with evidence for the verdict. It highlights any discrepancies found without attempting to fix them, leaving next steps to you.
